ygData.subject: To The Battle!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yanshosh and AJ, do you think you guys could wait up for ME until you reply back and forth again...it took me 3 hours to catch up on just you two s replies the

From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


Yanshosh and AJ, do you think you guys could wait up for ME until you reply 
back and forth again...it took me 3 hours to catch up on just you two's 
replies the other day! It would be very helpful, just this once.

* Iron Raptor smiled at Snow Techï¿½s little joke, glancing up at Prowl to see 
if he got it, even though it was about him.
But her eyes didn't stay on Prowl long enough to see his reaction before her 
attantion was drawn to Shadow Cat and her question. Glad to hear that they 
were able to get back to base together.
Iron Raptor was just about to answer when she saw all three bots before her 
stiffen and look as if they had just seen a ghost. Then everything seemed to 
happen at once, nearly making Iron Raptor jump in Prowl's arms.
Go?
Both Snow Tech and Shadow Cat were screaming for Prowl and herself to leave, 
finding herself looking down at the little ball of whimpering fur.
They were all freaked about something.
But then Iron Raptor heard something, far off and distant, crashing?
Snapping her head towards the direction of the sound and bringing up a scan 
of the area she finally located a group of monsterous machines headed there 
way. Remaining calm while her freinds remained static and bugged out behind 
her.
Iron Raptor stepped out of Prowls arms, her head still facing the direction 
of the appraoching mobb. But then she turned and looked at ShadowCat.*

" Who are they?"

* Then turning her head towards the machines again, Iron Raptor stood 
broadly and squared her shoulders...recieving Klusters transmission and 
Prowls imput on an Alliance attack.
Growling at Prowl's slightly paniced tone.*

" The Cybertronian Fire will stand up to their attacks at least until we get 
there."

* Her voice was stearn and one that was not to be argued with.
The approaching creatures would have to wait indeed.
Iron Raptor turned towards her friends, determination in her mind. < I don't 
know what's going on here but none of us are going to stick around to find 
out.> she thought to Prowl before pointing a finger towards her panicing 
friends.*

" Shadow Cat, get ahold of yourself and fly Snow Tech and the little one out 
of here. The directions of 65.7346. There you'll find the Cybertronian Fire. 
But watch it! The enemy could be there already. Arm your weapons and fight 
alongside the Maximals if the battle has started already. Prowl and I will 
be right behind you.
Now, GO!"

* Iron Raptor then looked towards Prowl.*

" Fore safety, you and I aren't going to leave the ground until I know they 
these three are safely in the air and away from those...things. Then we'll 
follow them."

* Her eyes remained on Prowl as she continued the conversation in her mind.*
< There has to be something deep going on here for them to be like this. And 
as soon as everything is cleared up with the Alliance I want to get to the 
bottom of this.>
* From there, she waited for her friends to lead the way home.
Iron Raptor growled.*
< Out of the cooking pot and right into the fire....>
* The battle with the Alliance wouldn't be easy, but it gave them a chance 
to use their new bodies, and maybe get to controle them a little batter. Who 
knew? The Alliance might not know just what they were dealing with.
But then Iron Raptor sighed.
Wishful thinking.*
